results.title: Is metformin poised for a second career as an antimicrobial?

results.title: Houttuynia cordata Facilitates Metformin on Ameliorating Insulin Resistance Associated with Gut Microbiota Alteration in OLETF Rats
results.text_hl: H. cordata, together with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, exerts intensive sensibilization to insulin; the corresponding mechanisms are associated with alleviation of @<m>DISEASE_Endotoxemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019446 @@@endotoxemia@@@ via regulation of gut microbiota, particularly Roseburia, @SPECIES_239935 @@@Akkermansia@@@, and Gram-negative bacterium.
